title: Lynda - Moodle 2.6 Essential Training
description:
Moodle is one of the most popular learning management systems for corporate and educational use. This course will help you create engaging online courses for business, KÃ¢â‚¬â€œ12, and even college settings and get your students excited about learning. Aaron Quigley first gets you up to speed with the new features in Moodle 2.6, and then builds a digital classroom from the ground up, starting with a paper syllabus. Learn how to customize Moodle's appearance and your preferences, structure a course, add content and students, create online quizzes, manage your gradebooks, and more.
Topics include:
Customizing your profile
Adding media and Google Maps
Adding assignments
Creating quiz questions
Embedding YouTube videos on a new page
Enrolling students
Sending messages
Conducting class surveys
Grading assignments
